description.@value: Serve over ice cream, pound cake, angel food cake or with sliced apples

recipeIngredient.@value: salted butter, room temperature, cut up into 6 pieces

recipeInstructions.@value: Stirring constantly with a rubber spatula, heat sugar in a medium saucepan over medium heat, until clumps form and melt into a thick, amber-colored liquid. When sugar has completely melted, add the butter and allow to melt.  Slowly, drizzle in 1/2 cup of heavy cream while stirring. Allow the mixture to boil for 1 minute, being careful to not burn the caramel.Remove from heat and stir in 1 teaspoon of salt. Allow caramel to cool before using.
